Author: AtmoOmen
Name: Currency Tracker
Description:
Aimed to help you track changes of various in-game currencies and record them as transactions.
Also provides features for queries, graphs, exporting data, and custom currencies tracker.
Changelog:
- Preset currencies have been reduced from 19 to 3 (Now: Gil, Tomestones with/without weekly capped [exclude Poetic]).

Note: The transactions data for currencies removed from the preset currencies are not deleted, all you have to do is to add back the currencies you want in the form of a custom currency tracker (Click the "+" above the currency list)!
